column4: does anyone know of any good samba guides? i followed one on ubuntuguide.org but I still can't get it to work. when windows users browse my shares it fails authentication, even though they have been added to the samba group and have permission to read/write my shares.
I will be kind but if he had of read my whole text he would have seen that I have already followed the guide.
have you tried the official samba site? it has great documentation with some examples, that might help you
